summary: All five food items (Chicken Biryani, Paneer Tikka, Aloo Paratha, Matar Paneer, Matar Paneer Roti) are properly implemented in the frontend initialization component with correct specifications. The backend has been updated to support multiple categories per food item through a migration. All requirements are satisfied.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module that converts single category field to categories array
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified only adding five food items to the database. No requirement mentioned changing the schema from single category to multiple categories or creating a migration system.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin authentication check in InitializeData component
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify that data initialization should be restricted to admin users only. The requirement was simply to add the food items to the database.
